name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyLens AI: Webpage and YouTube Video Summarizer

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MyLens AI turns any website or YouTube video into easy-to-understand visuals like mindmaps, timelines, flowcharts, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Thereâ€™s a lot of information online, from long articles to detailed reports and YouTube videos. Finding the key points can take a lot of time. The MyLens Chrome Extension changes that by turning any webpage or video into a simple, visual summary.

With just one click, MyLens AI captures the essence of complex content and transforms it into simple, shareable visuals like mindmaps, timelines, quadrants, tables, flowcharts, and more.

Why Use MyLens?

â³ Save Time: MyLens gets you straight to the information you need. Instead of reading a long article or watching a whole video, MyLens pulls out the key points so you can learn faster.

ğŸ“¹ Works on Any Website or YouTube Video: Wherever you are online, MyLens can break down the information and turn it into a visual summary. Just click the extension while browsing, and the AI will do the rest.

ğŸ¨ Visual Summaries: MyLens goes beyond summarizingâ€”it analyzes the information and creates clear visuals that highlight the main ideas you need, such as:
- Mindmaps: See how ideas are categorized and connected.
- Timelines: Perfect for events or step-by-step guides.
- Quadrants: Compare different points or ideas.
- Tables: Break down the information into simple organized sections.
- Flowcharts: Visualize processes or decision paths in a clear, step-by-step format.

ğŸ¯ Focus on What Matters: You decide whatâ€™s important. Tell MyLens which parts of a webpage or video you want it to focus on, whether itâ€™s a quick overview or specific details. MyLens adapts to your needs.

ğŸ‘Œ Simple to Use: MyLens fits right into your browsing experience. Thereâ€™s no need to switch apps. Once the summary is ready, you can easily download it, or go to your workspace and customize it.

Who Can Benefit?

ğŸ“ Students & Educators: MyLens makes learning and teaching easier by turning textbooks, articles, lessons, and videos into engaging visual summaries.

ğŸ’¼ Professionals & Business Teams: From analyzing reports to summarizing industry articles, MyLens helps professionals quickly extract the information they need.

ğŸ’» Content Creators & Marketers: Quickly pull the main ideas from articles or videos to inspire new content. MyLens provides an efficient way to gather information for research, planning, or storytelling.

ğŸ”¬ Researchers & Analysts: Simplify long studies, documents, and data into concise visual formats. MyLens makes it easier to identify patterns, draw conclusions, and present findings in a way thatâ€™s clear and accessible.
